on reading compounds: 燻煙【クンエン】smoking (esp. as a means of preserving food)
kun reading compounds: 燻べる【くすべる】to smoke, to fumigate
燻べる【くすべる】to smoke, to fumigate
燻す【いぶす】to smoke (something), to fumigate, to oxidize, to oxidise

燻る【くすぶる】to smoke, to smoulder, to smolder, to sputter, to be sooty, to be smoke-stained, to smoulder (e.g. a dispute), to smolder, to seclude oneself, to live in obscurity, to stay in the same level (of social position, circumstances, etc.)

燻る【くすぶる】to smoke, to smoulder, to smolder, to sputter, to be sooty, to be smoke-stained, to smoulder (e.g. a dispute), to smolder, to seclude oneself, to live in obscurity, to stay in the same level (of social position, circumstances, etc.)
燻らす【くゆらす】to smoke (e.g. pipe), to puff (cigarette)
